rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2986, 3462, P6003}
Must have passed 4 (I/W) units in {PGW5201, PGW5202, PGW5203, PGW5204}

description: Individuals with burn injuries present with unique and complex care needs that require a multidisciplinary approach to address the physical and psychological needs. This unit explores the causes of burn injuries, first aid and subsequent management and interventions to minimise complications such as scarring and contractures. Scar formation and management are investigated in detail including complications (both physical and psychological) that arise from scarring.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
